review_data.title: Disappointing
review_data.content: this is the most disappointing thing i've seen. no people. no food. there were 4 food stands whereas 1 person was actually inside one , working. we wasted 8 chfs for a bus ticket here. ended up going back to the city to eat somewhere...More

review_data.title: What a massive complex!
review_data.content: I visited Micas Garten (Frau Gerolds Pop-Up in Altstetten) during their July Street Food Festival. Located at the Micafil station (Tram #2, Bus #31), this massive complex offers an impressive hangout spot arranging from pallet seating, tiered theatre/stadium seating with lots of throw pillows, to...More
